title: NFL New Year's resolutions & 2015 playoff picture
itunes:title: NFL New Year's resolutions & 2015 playoff picture
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling, and Marc Sessler – discuss the latest news from around the NFL, including the Eagles firing head coach Chip Kelly, and reports that connect Peyton Manning to HGH. Then, the heroes break down the 2015 playoff picture, and talk about the matchups they want to see in January. Plus, New Year's resolutions for some of the biggest names in the NFL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
